short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically clicks the 'Continue Generation' and 'Regenerate' buttons on ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chat GPT "生成を続ける"ボタンを自動でクリックします。

Privacy Policy: This extension does not collect, store, or transmit any personal data. The activeTab permission is used to interact with the current tab to automate button clicks for convenience. The scripting permission is required to inject and execute the script that performs these automated actions. The host permissions are necessary to specify the websites (https://chat.openai.com/* and https://chatgpt.com/*) where the extension will be active.
